articles.description: The Bench also considered certificates showing his participation in prison educational activities, including an essay competition and a programme studying the thoughts of Mahatma Gandhi

articles.title: Bombay HC grants bail to accused in Baba Siddique murder case
articles.description: The accused, in his bail plea, claimed he was implicated in the case and that the allegations levelled against him were baseless and vague

articles.title: Top Maoist leader Prabhakar, six others killed in Gadchiroli operations
articles.description: One C-60 jawan died during operation, another injured; the police have so far recovered three AK-47 rifles, one SLR and one .303 rifle from the location

articles.title: ‘Flying to Baramati, will talk tomorrow’: Attendant’s father recalls her last words
articles.description: “Pappa, I am flying to Baramati tomorrow (Wednesday) with DCM Ajit Pawar. After dropping him, I will go to Nanded and will speak to you once I reach the hotel…” Shivkumar Mali said, recounting his last conversation with his daughter Pinky Mali, an attendant killed in the Baramati plane crash

articles.title: Ajit Pawar would always be remembered for his dedication to public service: Pawan Kalyan
articles.description: Maharashtra Deputy CM Ajit Pawar and four others were killed on January 28, after an aircraft carrying them crash landed in Baramati in Pune district

articles.title: Air crash which killed Ajit Pawar to be probed, says Maharashtra Deputy CM Eknath Shinde
articles.description: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and four others were killed after an aircraft carrying them crashed in Pune

articles.title: Actor held for allegedly raping domestic help on promise of marriage in Mumbai
articles.description: Nadeem Khan allegedly raped his domestic help over a period of 10 years

articles.title: Accused held within 12 hours for professor’s murder at Mumbai’s Malad railway station
articles.description: A minor argument between the victim, Alok Kumar Singh, a professor with NM College, and Shinde while they were alighting from a local train escalated into a brutal attack, the police official said

articles.title: Shiv Sena (UBT) approaches police over two ‘missing’ corporators in Kalyan civic body
articles.description: The possibility of pressure, fraud, kidnapping or other criminal nature behind this incident cannot be ruled out,” Shiv Sena (UBT) Kalyan district chief Sharad Shivraj Patil said

articles.title: Mumbai police get gangster Ravi Pujari’s custody in Remo D’Souza extortion case
articles.description: Ravi Pujari has been remanded in police custody till January 27, an official said

articles.title: TMC MP Abhishek meets family of Bengal migrant worker killed in Pune
articles.description: The visit by Abhishek Banerjee to the residence of the deceased migrant worker comes a day after West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee termed the killing  of Sukhen Mahato in Maharashtra a “hate crime”

articles.title: AAIB preliminary report on plane crash near Baramati to be released very soon: Civil Aviation Minister
articles.description: On February 10, NCP (SP) MLA Rohit Pawar alleged that there was reason to suspect sabotage in the tragic air crash that killed his uncle Ajit Pawar and demanded a comprehensive probe by multiple expert agencies

articles.title: Baba Siddique murder case: Mumbai court frames charges against 27
articles.description: “This marks a significant step forward in the trial process, as the framing of charges sets the stage for the commencement of evidence and witness examination,” says senior lawyer Trivankumar Karnani

articles.title: A panchayat dream and a daughter’s murder
articles.description: On January 29, a girl’s body was found in the Nizam Sagar distributary canal in Telangana’s Nizamabad. The police say the girl’s father killed her, his firstborn, so that his wife could contest the panchayat election. Under Maharashtra’s rules, candidates with more than two children cannot contest local elections and the couple had three. Marri Ramu travels to Nizamabad and Nanded to trace the sequence of the tragedy

articles.title: Maoist killed, C-60 commando injured in encounter in Gadchiroli; two Maoist camps destroyed
articles.description: The operation involving 14 C-60 units under SDPO Bhamragd began near Phodewada village on the Gadchiroli-Narayanpur border after specific intelligence was received on the evening of February 3, about the presence of ultras of company number 10 of the outlawed Communist Party of India (Maoist), an official said

articles.title: Watch: State funeral for Ajit Pawar in Baramati
articles.description: The last rites of Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar, killed in a plane crash, were held with full state honours on Thursday (January 29, 2026) at Baramati in Pune district. Union Ministers Amit Shah, Nitin Gadkari, former Union Minister Sharad Pawar and BJP president Nitin Nabin attended the 66-year-old Nationalist Congress Party (NCP) chief’s funeral at the Vidya Pratishthan ground at Baramati, around 100 km from Pune.

articles.title: 'We're Old-Fashioned...': Top Court On "Physical Relations" Before Marriage
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Monday made strong verbal remarks on pre-marital relationships while hearing a bail plea in a case involving allegations of rape and promise of marriage.

Pakistan: 2 killed, 14 injured in IED blast in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
articles.description: A bomb blast near a police station in Pakistan's Bannu district has claimed at least two lives, including a child, and injured 14 others. The improvised explosive device, reportedly a time bomb attached to a motorcycle, detonated near shops. Authorities have cordoned off the area and launched a search operation, with officials condemning the act as an attack on peace.

articles.title: Greater Noida: 3-year-old killed after slipping into water-filled pit in Dalelgarh village
articles.description: A letter flagging water accumulation along a Dalelgarh village road was sent on February 4, days before a 3-year-old boy drowned in Greater Noida

articles.description: Preliminary estimates suggest that goods worth several lakhs of rupees were reduced to ashes. An assessment of the total loss is underway.

articles.title: 5 killed as car rams into bus in Karnataka
articles.description: Five men died in a late-night crash near Nelamangala when their car collided with a bus. Police are investigating the cause and checking for alcohol involvement.

articles.title: 2 killed in explosion at chemical factory in Karnataka
articles.description: Two migrant workers died and four were injured in a chemical tank explosion at a factory in Bihar during dismantling work. Investigation underway.

articles.title: BJP MLA Basavaraj sent to CID custody in murder case
articles.description: BJP MLA Byrathi Basavaraj was remanded to seven days of CID custody in a murder case linked to realtor Shivaprakash's death last year.
